statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT feedback_id, interaction_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE 'Great%' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, interaction_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%Positive%' ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND interaction_type IN ('Compliment', 'Criticism') ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, interaction_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 104 AND feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback.feedback_text, feedback.rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating = 5;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_date, f.feedback_rating FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN feedback f ON i.interaction_id = f.interaction_id ORDER BY f.feedback_rating DESC, i.interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_details FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customers.name, interactions.interaction_date, feedback.rating FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN feedback ON interactions.interaction_id = feedback.interaction_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
